verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H5315><s%> 'If anyone sins <S%H2398><s%> unintentionally, <S%H7684><s%> in any of the things which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has commanded <S%H4687><s%> not to be done, <S%H6213><s%> and does <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H259><s%> one of them: <S%H2007><s%>

if the anointed <S%H4899><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> sins <S%H2398><s%> so as to bring guilt <S%H819><s%> on the people, <S%H5971><s%> then let him offer <S%H7126><s%> for his sin, <S%H2403><s%> which he has sinned, <S%H2398><s%> a young <S%H1241><s%> bull <S%H6499><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> for a sin offering. <S%H2403><s%>

He shall bring <S%H935><s%> the bull <S%H6499><s%> to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting <S%H4150><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and he shall lay <S%H5564><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> of the bull, <S%H6499><s%> and kill <S%H7819><s%> the bull <S%H6499><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

The anointed <S%H4899><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> some of the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the bull, <S%H6499><s%> and bring <S%H935><s%> it to the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting. <S%H4150><s%>

The priest <S%H3548><s%> shall dip <S%H2881><s%> his finger <S%H676><s%> in the blood, <S%H1818><s%> and sprinkle <S%H5137><s%> some of the blood <S%H1818><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%> of the sanctuary. <S%H6944><s%>

The priest <S%H3548><s%> shall put <S%H5414><s%> some of the blood <S%H1818><s%> on the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> of sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> which is in the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting; <S%H4150><s%> and he shall pour <S%H8210><s%> out all of rest of the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the bull <S%H6499><s%> at the base <S%H3247><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> which is at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting. <S%H4150><s%>

He shall take all the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the bull <S%H6499><s%> of the sin offering <S%H2403><s%> off <S%H7311><s%> of it; <S%H2459><s%> the fat that covers <S%H3680><s%> the innards, <S%H7130><s%> and all the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is on the innards, <S%H7130><s%>

and the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys, <S%H3629><s%> and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is on them, <S%H3689><s%> which is by the loins, and the cover <S%H3508><s%> on the liver, <S%H3516><s%> with the kidneys, <S%H3629><s%> he shall take away, <S%H5493><s%>

as it is taken off <S%H7311><s%> of the bull <S%H7794><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings. <S%H8002><s%> The priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> them on the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering. <S%H5930><s%>
The bull <S%H6499><s%>'s skin, <S%H5785><s%> all its flesh, <S%H1320><s%> with its head, <S%H7218><s%> and with its legs, <S%H3767><s%> its innards, <S%H7130><s%> and its dung, <S%H6569><s%>

even the whole bull <S%H6499><s%> shall he carry forth <S%H3318><s%> outside <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> to a clean <S%H2889><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> where the ashes <S%H1880><s%> are poured out, <S%H8211><s%> and burn <S%H8313><s%> it on wood <S%H6086><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%> Where <S%H413><s%> the ashes <S%H1880><s%> are poured out <S%H8211><s%> it shall be burned. <S%H8313><s%>

<S%H5712><s%>"'If the whole congregation of Israel <S%H3478><s%> sins, <S%H7686><s%> and the thing <S%H1697><s%> is hidden <S%H5956><s%> from the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the assembly, <S%H6951><s%> and they have done <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H259><s%> of the things which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has commanded <S%H4687><s%> not to be done, <S%H6213><s%> and are guilty; <S%H816><s%>

when the sin <S%H2403><s%> in which they have sinned <S%H2398><s%> is known, <S%H3045><s%> then the assembly <S%H6951><s%> shall offer <S%H7126><s%> a young <S%H1241><s%> bull <S%H6499><s%> for a sin <S%H2403><s%> offering, <S%H935><s%> and bring it before <S%H6440><s%> the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting. <S%H4150><s%>

The elders <S%H2205><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall lay <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> of the bull <S%H6499><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and the bull <S%H6499><s%> shall be killed <S%H7819><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
The anointed <S%H4899><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the bull <S%H6499><s%> to the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting: <S%H4150><s%>

and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall dip <S%H2881><s%> his finger <S%H676><s%> in the blood, <S%H1818><s%> and sprinkle <S%H5137><s%> it seven <S%H7651><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the veil. <S%H6532><s%>

He shall put <S%H5414><s%> some of the blood <S%H1818><s%> on the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> which is before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> that is in the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting; <S%H4150><s%> and the rest of the blood <S%H1818><s%> he shall pour out <S%H8210><s%> at the base <S%H3247><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> which is at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting. <S%H4150><s%>
All its fat <S%H2459><s%> he shall take <S%H7311><s%> from it, <S%H6999><s%> and burn it on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

Thus shall he do <S%H6213><s%> with the bull; <S%H6499><s%> as he did <S%H6213><s%> with the bull <S%H6499><s%> of the sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> so shall he do <S%H6213><s%> with this; <S%H3548><s%> and the priest shall make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for them, <S%H5545><s%> and they shall be forgiven.

He shall carry forth <S%H3318><s%> the bull <S%H6499><s%> outside <S%H2351><s%> the camp, <S%H4264><s%> and burn <S%H8313><s%> it as he burned <S%H8313><s%> the first <S%H7223><s%> bull. <S%H6499><s%> It is the sin offering <S%H2403><s%> for the assembly. <S%H6951><s%>

<S%H5387><s%>"'When a ruler sins, <S%H2398><s%> and unwittingly <S%H7684><s%> does <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H259><s%> one of all the things which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> his God <S%H430><s%> has commanded <S%H4687><s%> not to be done, <S%H6213><s%> and is guilty; <S%H816><s%>

if his sin, <S%H2403><s%> in which he has sinned, <S%H2398><s%> is made known <S%H3045><s%> to him, <S%H935><s%> he shall bring as his offering <S%H7133><s%> a <S%H8163><s%> goat, <S%H8163><s%> a male <S%H2145><s%> without blemish. <S%H8549><s%>

He shall lay <S%H5564><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> of the goat, <S%H8163><s%> and kill <S%H7819><s%> it in the place <S%H4725><s%> where they kill <S%H7819><s%> the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> It is a sin offering. <S%H5930><s%>

The priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> some of the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the sin offering <S%H2403><s%> with his finger, <S%H676><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> it on the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering. <S%H5930><s%> He shall pour out <S%H8210><s%> the rest of its blood <S%H1818><s%> at the base <S%H3247><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering. <S%H5930><s%>

All its fat <S%H2459><s%> he shall burn <S%H6999><s%> on the altar, <S%H4196><s%> like the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings; <S%H8002><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for him concerning his sin, <S%H2403><s%> and he will be forgiven. <S%H5545><s%>

<S%H259><s%>"'If anyone <S%H259><s%> of the common <S%H776><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> sins <S%H2398><s%> unwittingly, <S%H7684><s%> in doing <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H259><s%> of the things which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has commanded <S%H4687><s%> not to be done, <S%H6213><s%> and is guilty; <S%H816><s%>

if his sin, <S%H2403><s%> which he has sinned, <S%H2398><s%> is made known <S%H3045><s%> to him, <S%H935><s%> then he shall bring for his offering <S%H7133><s%> a <S%H8166><s%> goat, <S%H8166><s%> a female <S%H5347><s%> without blemish, <S%H8549><s%> for his sin <S%H2403><s%> which he has sinned. <S%H2398><s%>

He shall lay <S%H5564><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> of the sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> and kill <S%H7819><s%> the sin offering <S%H2403><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> of burnt offering. <S%H2403><s%>

The priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> some of its blood <S%H1818><s%> with his finger, <S%H676><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> it on the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering; <S%H5930><s%> and the rest of its blood <S%H1818><s%> he shall pour out <S%H8210><s%> at the base <S%H3247><s%> of the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

All its fat <S%H2459><s%> he shall take away, <S%H5493><s%> like the fat <S%H2459><s%> is taken away <S%H5493><s%> from off of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings; <S%H8002><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> it on the altar <S%H4196><s%> for a pleasant <S%H5207><s%> aroma <S%H7381><s%> to Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for him, <S%H5545><s%> and he will be forgiven.
<S%H935><s%>"'If he brings a lamb <S%H3532><s%> as his offering for a sin <S%H2403><s%> offering, <S%H7133><s%> he shall bring <S%H935><s%> a female <S%H5347><s%> without blemish. <S%H8549><s%>

He shall lay <S%H5564><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> of the sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> and kill <S%H7819><s%> it for a sin offering <S%H2403><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> where they kill <S%H7819><s%> the burnt offering. <S%H5930><s%>

The priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> some of the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the sin offering <S%H2403><s%> with his finger, <S%H676><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> it on the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering; <S%H5930><s%> and all the rest of its blood <S%H1818><s%> he shall pour out <S%H8210><s%> at the base <S%H3247><s%> of the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

All its fat <S%H2459><s%> he shall take away, <S%H5493><s%> like the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the lamb <S%H3775><s%> is taken away <S%H5493><s%> from the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings; <S%H8002><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> them on the altar, <S%H4196><s%> on the offerings of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> made by fire; <S%H801><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for him concerning his sin <S%H2403><s%> that he has sinned, <S%H2398><s%> and he will be forgiven. <S%H5545><s%>
